lead_paragraph: Stephen Curry on Tuesday scaled heights never reached by NBA greats such as Magic Johnson, Michael Jordan and LeBron James when he became the first unanimous winner of the league's Most Valuable Player award.

headline.main: Curry Voted NBA's First Unanimous Most Valuable Player
headline.print_headline: Curry Voted NBA's First Unanimous Most Valuable Player

snippet: Stephen Curry on Tuesday scaled heights never reached by NBA greats such as Magic Johnson, Michael Jordan and LeBron James when he became the first unanimous winner of the league's Most Valuable Player award....
